Chinese Herbal Extracts.name: Quercetin Extract Powder 95%
Chinese Herbal Extracts.TableDescription:
Packaging Size1 kg
Packaging Typedrum
Brandshree sai biotech
Organic TypeNon Organic
Formpowder
Chinese Herbal Extracts.ParagraphDescription: Minimum order quantity: 25 Kg
Chinese Herbal Extracts.divDescription: Quercetin belongs to a group of plant pigments called flavonoids that give many fruits, flowers, and vegetables their colors. Flavonoids, such as quercetin, are antioxidants. They scavenge particles in the body known as free radicals which damage cell membranes, tamper with DNA, and even cause cell death.Quercetin, a plant pigment is a potent antioxidant flavonoid and more specifically a flavonol, found mostly in onions, grapes, berries, cherries, broccoli, and citrus fruits. It is a versatile antioxidant known to possess protective abilities against tissue injury induced by various drug toxicities.

Chinese Herbal Extracts.divDescription: Berberine is an alkaloid extracted from various plants such as goldenseal and barberry. It has been used in traditional Chinese medicine for its antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties.
